intro: This document serves as a comprehensive product user manual for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service's (CLMS) Urban Atlas, specifically addressing the 2012 and 2018 reference years. It provides detailed mapping guidance for service providers to ensure the consistent production of high-resolution land use and land cover (LU/LC) maps across Functional Urban Areas (FUAs). The manual outlines specifications for product attributes, nomenclature, data formats, and quality control, and also provides information on two additional information layers: the Street Tree Layer (STL) and the Digital Height Model (DHM).
